Generated Narrative: ValueSet 1.2.250.1.213.1.1.5.451

version: 1; Last updated: 2024-12-19 05:06:47+0000; Language: fr-FR

Profil: Shareable ValueSet

  • Include ces codes sont définis dans 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.8.2.1
    CodeDisplay
    1209pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
    1210pT1: Tumor size 2 cm or less, limited to thyroid
    1211pT1a: Tumor 1 cm or less in greatest dimension limited to the thyroid.
    1212pT1b: Tumor more than 1 cm but not more than 2 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the thyroid
    1213pT2: Tumor more than 2 cm, but not more than 4 cm, limited to thyroid
    1214pT3: Tumor more than 4 cm limited to thyroid or any tumor with minimal extrathyroid extension (eg, extension to sternothyroid muscle or perithyroid soft tissues)
    1215pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor of any size extending beyond the thyroid capsule to invade subcutaneous soft tissues, larynx, trachea, esophagus or recurrent laryngeal nerve
    1216pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor invades prevertebral fascia or encases carotid artery or mediastinal vessels

name: JDV_Thyroide_pT_sauf_carcinome_anaplasique_CISIS

concept.display: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1: Tumor size 2 cm or less, limited to thyroid
pT1a: Tumor 1 cm or less in greatest dimension limited to the thyroid.
pT1b: Tumor more than 1 cm but not more than 2 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the thyroid
pT2: Tumor more than 2 cm, but not more than 4 cm, limited to thyroid
pT3: Tumor more than 4 cm limited to thyroid or any tumor with minimal extrathyroid extension (eg, extension to sternothyroid muscle or perithyroid soft tissues)
pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor of any size extending beyond the thyroid capsule to invade subcutaneous soft tissues, larynx, trachea, esophagus or recurrent laryngeal nerve
pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor invades prevertebral fascia or encases carotid artery or mediastinal vessels
